mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, b.* from (select * from movies order by m_code desc) b where rownum <=#{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}
mapper.update: update movies set m_name=#{m_name}, m_director=#{m_director}, m_actor=#{m_actor}, m_company=#{m_company}, m_time=#{m_time}, m_playDate=#{m_playDate}, m_description=#{m_description}, m_posterImg=#{m_posterImg} where m_code=#{m_code}
